articles.author: Sounak Mukhopadhyay
articles.title: ICC World Cup 2023 Most Run Scorers List: These Indian batters have made it to Top 10 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The ICC World Cup 2023 is turning out to record high scores from a number of teams like South Africa, India, Pakistan and New Zealand.
articles.content: In the ongoing ICC World Cup 2023, South Africa's Quinton de Kock has risen as the top run-getter, amassing a remarkable 407 runs across just five games. His highest single-game score is 174. What st… [+2050 chars]
